title: LGs stunning 65-inch G4 OLED TV has dropped to its lowest-ever price this Black Friday
content: LG's 65-inch G4 OLED TV normally costs $3,399.99. As of Nov. 27, it's down to $2,296.99 in Black Friday sales.
